mcbj.HoldTrace.find_psd_intervals¶

HoldTrace.find_psd_intervals(bias_steps_ranges: ndarray, bias_steps_at: ndarray, current: ndarray) → Tuple[ndarray, ndarray]¶

Find intervals for individual PSD calculations

Parameters:
bias_steps_rangesnp.ndarray
currentnp.ndarray

measured current during hold measurement

Returns:
psd_intervalsnp.ndarray

parts cut from the current array to calculate the PSDs

psd_interval_rangesnp.ndarray

bounding points of the cut out intervals

See also

find_max_fft_interval
calculate_freq_resolution
